articles.title: Bellicose Remarks of S. Korean Puppets Blasted
articles.content:
Bellicose Remarks of S. Korean Puppets Blasted
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea gave an answer to the question raised by KCNA Thursday as regards the bellicose remarks made by the south Korean puppets against the DPRK recently. 
					Accusing the conservative group of south Korea of trumpeting about "sanctions", groundlessly taking issue even with the preparations made by the DPRK for launching a satellite according to its plan for the space development for peaceful purposes, the spokesman said: 
					
					As far as the issue of satellite launch is concerned, it is the DPRK's sovereign right universally recognized which does not allow mere puppets to take issue with it. 
					
					The Korean Committee of Space Technology made it clear that the preparations for launching the satellite is part of the work for putting various types of satellites into orbit which has been under way according to the state long-term plan for space development on the basis of shining successes made in the field of satellite launch in the past period. 
					
					If they are not sure about whether it will be a satellite or something else, they will come to know when watching what will soar in the air in the days ahead. 
					
					As for their loudmouthed "sanctions", "intercepting" and "retaliatory strike," we are ready for everything.
					
					 If the puppet warmongers infringe upon our inviolable dignity even a bit by what they called "retaliatory strike" and the like, we will not only punish the  provokers but reduce their inter citadel to debris.

articles.title: Ten Major Crimes of Lee Myung Bak Group Disclosed
articles.content:
Ten Major Crimes of Lee Myung Bak Group Disclosed
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute in an indictment issued on Feb. 25 disclosed ten major crimes committed by the Lee Myung Bak group in the first year of its office.
					 It singled out as ten major crimes the group of traitors' call for giving priority to foreign forces, revival of the fascist dictatorial system, opening of the south Korean market to the American beef fraught with the danger of mad cow disease, act of rendering economy bankrupt and deterioration of people's livelihood, a "coup staged" by it  against "history," declaration of its policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen, total negation of the north-south declarations, nullification of the inter-Korean agreements, suspension of undertakings for inter-Korean cooperation and trumpeting about "contingency" and call for  "a preemptive attack."
					
					 According to the indictment, the Lee group made south Korea totally dependent upon the U.S. in all fields including politics, economy, military affairs, advocating the "theory of giving priority to the south Korea-U.S. alliance." 
					
					 Traitor Lee not only worked hard to cover up the crimes committed by Japan in the past but kowtowed to the Japanese king, talking about "future-oriented partnership" with it. 
					
					 The group not only focused power on "Chongwadae" and increased its dictatorial function but indiscriminately arrested and detained members of the organizations for reunification and democracy and figures of conscience in south Korea after labeling them "pro-north leftist forces" by invoking the fascist "National Security Law." It enacted various kinds of new evil laws or retrogressively revised the existing ones in a more fascist manner. 
					
					 Due to the group's opening of the south Korean market to the U.S. beef fraught with the danger of the mad cow disease more than 200,000 stockbreeders have been put on the verge of bankruptcy overnight and the people's health and lives are seriously threatened.
					
					 The traitor grabbed power under the mask of "president for economic recovery" but what he has done in the first year of his office is that he has driven the south Korean economy to a catastrophic crisis and thrown the people into destitution. 
					
					 The group falsified the fact by claiming that the April 3 Popular Uprising on Jeju Island against the U.S. occupation of south Korea and its colonial rule over it was triggered off by the "agitation of the "leftist forces" and even described the April 19 Popular Uprising as a "demo" and kept mum about the June Popular Resistance and Kwangju Resistance.
					
					 It also whitewashed the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea as a rule to "enlighten and modernize" Korea and praised the U.S. imperialists' "military rule" over Korea right after the liberation as a policy for "defending liberal democracy" and "ensuring the democratic autonomy."
					
					 It is one more gross distortion of history that the puppet group deliberately spoke ill of the preceding regimes, talking about the "lost decade."
					
					 The Lee group has desperately pursued confrontation with fellow countrymen since it declared "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars," a theory of confrontation against reunification as its "policy towards the north."
					
					 It has refused to implement the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, totally negating them.
					
					 Due to the Lee group's moves, the inter-Korean agreements have been reduced to dead documents and scrapped and even the legal mechanism for preventing military conflicts has been completely destroyed. 
					
					 Lee unilaterally suspended the tour of Mt. Kumgang which has been underway for the last decade, blustering that there would be no cooperation unless the north "dismantled" its nukes and "opened" it.  He has deliberately rendered the situation tense, putting the overall non-governmental cooperation such as the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone and the tour of Kaesong in a crisis.
					
					 What is the most dangerous of the Lee group's crimes committed against reunification and the nation is that it is letting loose a whole string of outbursts about "contingency" and "preemptive attack," groundlessly defiling the dignified system in the DPRK.
					
					  All facts clearly prove that it is impossible to save the inter-Korean ties from collapse and the nation is fated to meet disasters as long as Lee and his group are allowed to stay in power, the indictment noted, declaring that the Lee group's acts of treachery are unpardonable and it is bound to meet a stern punishment of history and the nation.

articles.title: Reception Given by Ministry of Culture of China
articles.content:
Reception Given by Ministry of Culture of China
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by the Ministry of Culture of China on Feb. 24 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on cultural cooperation between the governments of the DPRK and China.
					Present there on invitation were members of the DPRK government cultural delegation headed by Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					Cai Wu, minister of Culture of China, and officials concerned were present there.
					
					Cai Wu said in his speech at the reception that cooperation and exchange between the two countries have steadily gained depth in all fields including culture, science and technology, sports, education, public health and media and cooperation in the cultural field has become an important component of the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					He referred to the fact that the Korean people are waging a dynamic struggle to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					He affirmed that the Ministry of Culture of China would join the DPRK in boosting friendship, promoting exchange and deepening cooperation through diverse activities with the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship" as a momentum and thus carve out a more beautiful future of the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					Mun Jae Chol said that the two countries have achieved many successes in exchange and cooperation in the cultural field for the past 50 years since the conclusion of the agreement.
					
					He expressed expectation that the 2009-2011 working plan for cultural exchange signed this time would contribute to adorning the "year of DPRK-China friendship" more beautifully and promoting cultural exchange and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					It is the consistent stand of the DPRK government and the common desire of the two peoples to steadily boost the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations, he said, expressing the will to make strenuous efforts to do so.

articles.title: 4th National Meeting of Agitators Opens
articles.content:
4th National Meeting of Agitators Opens
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The 4th national meeting of agitators was opened at the April 25 House of Culture here on Thursday. 
					The meeting will review the successes and experience gained in the mass political work for building a rich and powerful country in the new century under the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and discuss the tasks facing the agitators and information workers, each in charge of five families.
					
					Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jung Rin, Kim Ki Nam, officials in the field of party ideological work, officials of working people's organizations, those in the fields of education, culture and arts and media, exemplary agitators in various domains of the national economy and information workers each in charge of five families.
					
					The participants listened to the recorded speech made by President Kim Il Sung at the national conference of the active agitators and information workers each in charge of five families "Agitators Must Set an Example in All Work and Know How to Rouse the Masses to Action" on March 9, Juche 60 (1971).
					
					Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, read out a congratulatory message of the WPK Central Committee to the participants in the meeting. 
					
					The message noted that Kim Il Sung gave an origin to the Juche-oriented mass political work in the forest of Mt. Paektu and created the anti-Japanese guerilla method of agitation work long ago, adding that he attached great importance to the agitation work in the whole course of leading  the building of a new country, the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, the deep-going socialist revolution and the gigantic socialist construction and wisely led the work to make sure that the might of the work was steadily increased. 
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il put forward the original theories and policies of agitation work in the days of leading the cause of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea and established a well-regulated system of agitation work throughout the Party, the message said, and continued:  He, at the same time, set all the agitation forces and means in motion to loudly sound the revolution and make the spirit of creation and innovation run high in every site of socialist construction. 
					
					It underlined the need for all agitators and the above-said information workers across the country to become ideological standard-bearers in building a great prosperous powerful nation who powerfully encourage the party members and other working people to bring about signal innovations and a great leap forward unprecedented in the history of the country, holding aloft the torch of new great revolutionary upswing kindled by Kim Jong Il in Kangson, the birthplace of the Chollima movement.
					
					Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, said in his report at the meeting that all the people are unhesitatingly laying down their lives to defend the headquarters of the revolution while deeply trusting and ardently following Kim Jong Il, adding that this stirring reality in the society is a striking demonstration of the might of the agitation work of the WPK as it has powerfully encouraged all members of the society to invariably glorify in the new century, too, the precious tradition of the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the spirit which has been consolidated in the long journey of the Juche revolution and has become part of their lives.
					
					He underlined the need for the agitators and the said information workers to dynamically conduct the agitation in the all-people general advance for adorning the 100th Juche year of Kim Il Sung's Korea with the great victory of Korean-style socialism and thus make the hearts of all the servicepersons and people burn with ardent patriotism. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The meeting continues.

articles.title: DPRK's Efforts to Solve Food Problem
articles.content:
DPRK's Efforts to Solve Food Problem
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il said that in order to solve the food problem, the main in clothing, food and housing, it is imperative to send a large quantity of fertilizer to the countryside while giving on-the-spot guidance to the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex some time ago.
					This news is arousing forcefully the Korean people to increase grain production, upholding the tasks put forth in the joint New Year editorial from the beginning of the year.
					
					The state is strengthening material, technical and labor support to the countryside to solve the shortage of food on its own at any cost this year.
					
					The Ministry of Agriculture made and sent to the co-op farms throughout the country various kinds of multi-media which show the superiority of the advanced farming technique and farming method and the ways for their application.
					
					The work for securing high-yielding seeds which need a less amount of fertilizer and high-yielding varieties suitable to relevant areas is being pushed ahead vigorously.
					
					Much effort is also being directed to turning out large quantities of organic fertilizer by combining agricultural production with stock-breeding in accordance with the world trend in the sector of the rural economy.
					
					Farms are producing hukbosan fertilizer with peat and humus soil and other materials, biological activated manure and organic composite fertilizer to carpet them on paddy and dry fields.
					
					The Korean People's Army and institutions, enterprises, dongs and neighborhood units across the country are carrying a great deal of minor farm implements and manure to the countryside busy with farming preparation for the year.

articles.title: Alma Mater of Woman Soccer Aces
articles.content:
Alma Mater of Woman Soccer Aces
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Juvenile sports schools in the DPRK are training lots of promising reserves of woman footballers.
					The juvenile sports school in Rakrang District, Pyongyang, is well known for having trained a number of footballers who have distinguished themselves in recent international games.
					
					Jon Myong Hwa, a forward who was awarded bronze football-shoe prize at the FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup New Zealand 2008, Ri Un Ae, a centre back who was active in the same football games, Yang Hye Ryon, Ro Chol Ok and Ri Yong Mi who made contributions to their team's capture of  the title at the 1st AFC U-16 Women's Championships, Ri Jong Sim, a forward who earned fame at the 2008 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup, and Phi Un Hui, who was the goal-keeper of the national selection were all graduates from the school.
					
					The school started the training of reserves of woman footballers in 1995. Its top target is to produce world-level aces.
					
					With a full grasp of the global trend of soccer development, it helps them acquire strategy and tactics suited to it.
					
					It selects trainees of good physical condition and intelligence and teaches them special skills in dribbling, flying kicking and heading.
					
					 Now graduates from the school are doing their bit in famous sports teams at home.

articles.title: Immortal Feats in Modeling Whole Society on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Immortal Feats in Modeling Whole Society on Juche Idea
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The army and people of Korea are recollecting with deep emotion the imperishable feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has led the Korean revolution along the one road of victory under the banner of transforming the whole society after the Juche idea.
					He, who had put forward many original thoughts and theories long ago, was engaged in indefatigable study for formulating anew the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Busy as he was with many state affairs, he energetically studied and analyzed the preceding theories while dealing with important issues of the revolution and construction.
					
					He, basing himself on this, found that the new guiding idea of the times was only the revolutionary idea of the President and proclaimed the programme for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea in February Juche 63 (1974).
					
					In order to put this programme into practice, he, with a tight grasp on idea and theory, has dynamically conducted the work of transforming man, nature and society as required by Juche.
					
					As a result, a great turning-point was marked in remoulding and changing all the fields of the revolution and construction in accordance with the requirements of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					The Wangjaesan Revolutionary Site and the Samjiyon Grand Monument, centers for the education in the revolutionary traditions, were built and the schoolchildren's marches began along the courses of the 1,000-ri journey for learning and the 1,000-ri journey for national liberation.
					
					The work for training people of Juche-type and remoulding man has been vigorously promoted by the mighty slogans full of Juche spirit advanced by him such as "Let us meet the requirements of Juche in ideology, technology and culture!", "Let us produce, study and live like the anti-Japanese guerrillas!" and "Let us live our own way!" and mass movements including the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement.
					
					The slogan of faith "Let us fight devotedly for the great leader!" has implanted in the minds of the servicepersons the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and brought them up to be a-match-for-a-hundred revolutionary army, thus decisively smashing the reckless war provocation moves of the enemy in each step and defending the motherland and people with credit.
					
					Amid the seething revolutionary enthusiasm, a large-size long-distance belt conveyer transportation line stretched out to the rough west sea, making a proud history of great creation and construction.
					
					The five revolutionary operas and "A Mountain Shrine"-type revolutionary drama were created and revolutionary films and revolutionary novels were produced with the result that a fresh heyday was brought about in literature and art as a whole. All this is a precious fruition of the might of ideology under the banner of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					All the army and people of Korea victoriously concluded the "Arduous March" and the forced march which were difficult beyond the imagination and ushered in the dawn of building a great, prosperous and powerful socialist country.
					
					The grand monumental edifices constructed in different parts of the country in the Songun era -- large-sized fields which was rezoned as befits the land of a socialist state, modern industrial establishments, poultry farms, the UHP electric arc furnace which is acme of the steel industry, the Wonsan Youth Power Station and other power stations -- are the precious wealth made by indomitable spirit.
					
					The army and people of Korea are forging ahead dynamically for the thriving of the socialist country and the accomplishment of the Juche revolutionary cause with the undying feats performed by
						Kim Jong Il under the banner of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea as lasting treasure.

articles.title: Struggle against Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning Called for
articles.content:
Struggle against Imperialists' Ideological and Cultural Poisoning Called for
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The people of the revolutionary countries and other countries desirous of independence should decisively foil the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning with a revolutionary ideological offensive in order to achieve the independent development and prosperity of their countries and nations and victoriously advance the human cause of global independence, says Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article.
					It goes on:
					
					Now the international relations develop and relations between countries and nations become closer, while cooperation and exchanges get brisk in different fields. The imperialists regard this as a golden chance of widely disseminating their decadent bourgeois ideology and culture among other countries.
					
					They are apt to utter such glossy words as "cultural exchange" and "development of human civilization." They label those countries which keep their doors shut to the ideological and cultural poisoning "closed society" and "dictatorial state" and force them to open their doors, advocating "freedom of thinking" and "theory of culture having no boundary." 
					
					The reality requires the world progressives to clearly see through the essence and danger of the imperialists' moves for ideological and cultural poisoning and heighten vigilance against them. 
					
					History proves that if ideology is neglected and ideological work given up in socialist society, the people will get ideologically ill, everything socialist will be degenerated and destroyed. And they will not be able to defend socialism no matter what strong economic and military potentials they have in case their socialist ideological position collapses. 
					
					Any attempt to allow the imperialists to disseminate the reactionary bourgeois ideology and culture and way of life under the signboard of "exchange and cooperation" would entail grave consequences.
					
					It is necessary to strictly guard against the infiltration of the decadent imperialist culture which is like narcotic benumbing the sound spirit of the people and, at the same time, expose the reactionary nature and danger of the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning and take practical measures to frustrate it.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Ban on Inter-Korean News Item Exchange under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Ban on Inter-Korean News Item Exchange under Fire
Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Recently the Lee Myung Bak group disallowed the exchange of news items with the north side proposed by the media headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration. This indicates that the "dialogue" and "cooperation" much touted by the group of traitors are whopping lies.
					Minju Joson Thursday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					In October last year, the media sub-committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the media headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration agreed to exchange news items. This was aimed to make contributions to national reconciliation and unity. That was why all Koreans warmly hailed the agreement, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					This notwithstanding, the Lee group totally banned the exchange of news items between the north and the south. This was a blatant challenge to the aspiration and wishes of the fellow countrymen for national reconciliation and unity.
					
					The puppets' claim that there is concern that the above-said exchange "may serve the propaganda purpose of the north" and "may be detrimental to security" is sheer sophism intended to justify their criminal acts.
					
					When media persons of the north and south are trying to create an atmosphere of national reconciliation and unity to help people know better about each other's reality through the exchange of news items, why are they making such far-fetched assertion about "concern" and "security?" Such assertion can be made only by those who are afraid of the DPRK's fair and aboveboard policy for national reunification and consistent efforts to implement it and the great vitality of the Songun politics being known to south Koreans through the above-said exchange.
					
					The ulterior intention of the Lee group is to quell the south Koreans' desire to achieve reunification through alliance with the north and continue rushing headlong into confrontation with fellow countrymen, utterly indifferent to the fate of the north-south relations and criticism made by others.
					
					It is crystal clear that it is impossible to improve the inter-Korean relations nor is it possible to realize dialogue and cooperation nor is it possible for the Koreans to escape the danger of a nuclear war as long as the traitors are allowed to stay in power. The only way of preventing such consequences is for all Koreans to intensify the anti-Lee Myung Bak struggle.

articles.title: Reinvestigation into Tragic Incident in Ryongsan Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Reinvestigation into Tragic Incident in Ryongsan Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society of south Korea demanded the puppet authorities make an overall reinvestigation into the tragic incident in Ryongsan on Feb. 23, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The results of the investigation announced by the prosecution in connection with the tragic incident in Ryongsan are little short of ignoring the demand of the people who want the probe of the truth, the organization held.
					
					 It accused the prosecution of its unfair behavior as it has neither punished those responsible for the killings including Kim Sok Gi, former chief of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency, nor called into question their crimes.
					
					 The organization stressed the need to institute a "law on special inspection" and make an overall reinvestigation into the tragic incident in Ryongsan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" was published in booklet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House in Russia on Feb. 11.
					The work, published on Jan. 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is the powerful political mode of our era that has inherited and developed the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung on attaching importance to the arms and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the era and the revolution and the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: February Holiday Celebrated in Kuwait and Sri Lanka
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated in Kuwait and Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Bulletins were issued by organizations in Kuwait and Sri Lanka on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					The preparatory committee for celebrating February 16 of Kuwait and the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association jointly issued a bulletin on Feb. 13 carrying several articles. 
					
					The bulletin in its preface introduced in detail the fact that colorful functions were briskly conducted in a worldwide scale to praise the idea, exploits and personality of Kim Jong Il, saying that the atmosphere of celebration was the eruption of ardent reverence of all people for the peerlessly great man who is devoting his all to the country, the people and the human cause of independence. 
					
					Articles of the bulletin praised the wise leadership and great traits of Kim Jong Il who kindled the torch of a new great revolutionary surge in Kangson, the birthplace of Chollima movement, and has led to victory the DPRK army and people in their all-out offensive for building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation. 
					
					The bulletin issued by the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association on Feb. 16 carried articles hailing the greatness of the illustrious commander who is making immortal contributions to the cause of global independence while frustrating the moves of imperialists against the DPRK with the ever-victorious Songun politics.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Works Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's works were held in Mongolia, Democratic Congo, Guinea and Ethiopia on Feb. 12 and 13 on the occasion of his birthday.
					The chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development and N.Sarantuya, member of its Leadership Council, noted that Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" serves as a guideline for settling all problems and explained and proved the importance of the issue of preserving the Juche character and national character in the present time.
					
					Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo, summarized the main systems of Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" and stressed that the Juche philosophy serves as a revolutionary one and a banner of struggle for the world progressive mankind for its validity and vitality.
					
					Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in a seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" noted with high appreciation that the Songun revolutionary line, Songun policy, is a strategic revolutionary line and political mode to be consistently held fast as long as imperialism remains in the world. 
					
					Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, explained the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work, "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction", adding that the work is a precious work which must be read by the youth and all other people of Ethiopia.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in Mongolia.

articles.title: Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-Reliance Studies Formed
articles.content:
Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-Reliance Studies Formed
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-Reliance Studies was formed on Feb. 18.
					 Vinod Mangla, director general of the Public News, was elected chairman of the society and Parveen Gupta, editor-in-chief of the Public News, secretary general of the society.

articles.title: Russian Party Leader on Korean People's Struggle to Build Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation
articles.content:
Russian Party Leader on Korean People's Struggle to Build Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, met the DPRK ambassador to Russia on Feb. 19.
					He sincerely hoped that the industrious and sincere Korean people would make great achievements in the struggle to implement the tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial under the wise guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il when referring to the struggle of the Korean people in building a great prosperous and powerful nation. 
					
					The worldwide financial crisis proves the validity of the line of economic construction of the DPRK which has developed the economy on the principle of self-reliance guided by the Juche idea, he said, noting that the DPRK's method of economic construction should be followed by the world.
					
					 The Liberal Democratic Party of Russia fully supports the just stand of the Workers' Party of Korea to achieve the reunification of the country and wishes the Korean people success in their just cause to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, he stressed.

articles.title: Birthday of Kim Jong Il Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Birthday of Kim Jong Il Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition, a seminar, round-table talks, an art performance, a film show and a reception took place in Russia, DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions in Peru, Mexico and Bulgaria, a function for friendship and culture and a photo exhibition in Congo and round-table talks by the Secretariat of the Pan-African Movement from Feb. 5 to 16 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos showing their undying feats, books and photos introducing the development of the DPRK and handicrafts associated with the resourcefulness and talents of the Korean people.
					
					The director of the Cultural Department of Kaluga Region of Russia in a speech at the opening ceremony of the exhibition said that Kim Jong Il visited Russia in the new century and thus performed undying feats in the development of the Russia-DPRK relations. He noted that the Russian people wish the Korean people greater success in socialist construction.
					
					The governor of San Miguel District, Lima, Peru, in a speech noted that Kim Jong Il is wisely leading the Korean people to a road of victory and prosperity. He stressed that Kim Jong Il is not only the great leader of the Korean people but the distinguished leader of the world progressive people.
					
					The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico in a speech said that the dynamic struggle waged by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il is a great inspiration to the world revolutionary parties and people aspiring after socialism.
					
					The acting director for Political Affairs and International Relations of the Pan-African Movement in the round-table talks highly praised the undying feats of Kim Jong Il who has firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation and built the whole country into a big family with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities, clairvoyant wisdom, matchless grit and warm love for the people.
					
					The participants in the film show saw a Korean film showing Kim Jong Il's visit to the Far-eastern Region of Russia.
					
					A congratulatory message and letter to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the functions in Russia.

articles.title: CRPP condena a los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP condena a los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada el dia 26 en relacion con que los titeres surcoreanos acusan a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) respondio como lo siguiente:
					La banda conservadora del Sur de Corea habla de la "sancion" cuestionando absurdamente hasta los preparativos de la RPDC para el lanzamiento del satelite artificial que se realiza segun el plan de desarrollo del cosmos con fines pacificos.
					
					 El lanzamiento del satelite artificial es el derecho independiente de la RPDC reconocido en la arena internacional. Por lo tanto, los titeres surcoreanos no deben censurarlo.
					
					 El Comite de Tecnologias Espaciales de Corea aclaro claramente que los preparativos en cuestion devienen un eslabon de la labor para lanzar varios satelites que se realiza segun el plan perspectivo estatal del desarrollo espacial basandose en los orgullosos exitos logrados hasta la fecha en el dominio de lanzamiento de satelite.
					
					 Si es dificil creer que sea satelite o no, seria mejor observar con gran atencion el que subira al cielo.
					
					Estamos totalmente listos para hacer frente a la "sancion", la "interceptacion" y el "contrafuego" de que hablan ellos. 
					
					Si los belicistas titeres se atreven a atentar nuestra dignidad sagrada con supuesto "contrafuego", seran  reducidos a cenizas no solo los provocadores sino tambien su bastion.

articles.title: IRP revela 10 crimenes de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
IRP revela 10 crimenes de banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Instituto de Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publico el dia 25 el registro de los 10 crimenes cometidos por la banda de Lee Myung Bak durante un ano de su mandato.
					El IRP califico de 10 crimenes la preconizacion de la teoria de dar prioridad a las fuerzas foraneas, la rehabilitacion del sistema de dictadura fascista, la apertura del mercado surcoreano a la carne de res norteamericana, la quiebra de la economia y la vida del pueblo, el "golpe de Estado en la historia", la declaracion de la politica de enfrentamiento fratricida, la negacion total a las declaraciones Norte-Sur, la anulacion de los acuerdos Norte-Sur, la interrupcion de las labores de cooperacion Norte-Sur y el disparate de la "situacion bruscamente cambiada" y del "ataque preventivo".
					
					Segun tal registro, bajo la consigna de "dar prioridad a las relaciones de alianza Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos",  la banda del traidor Lee convirtio el Sur de Corea en la colonia mas subordinada a este imperio en todos los dominios como la politica, economia y asuntos militares. 
					
					Bajo el pretexto de las "relaciones entre socios con vistas al futuro" con Japon, el traidor Lee trato de encubrir los crimenes del pais isleno perpetrados en el pasado y actuo con bajeza en su encuentro con el rey japones, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					Concentro el poder a Chongwadae (casa azul) y fortalecio su facultad dictatorial. En virtud de la fascista "ley de seguridad", reprimio y arresto sin ton ni son a las entidades democraticas por la reunificacion y las personalidades concienzudas del Sur de Corea tildandolas de "fuerzas izquierdistas pronorcoreanas", inventaron las infames leyes fascistas de toda indole o las enmendaron de manera mas fascista.
					
					Debido a la apertura del mercado surcoreano a la carne de res norteamericana, mas de 200 mil familias pecuarias surcoreanas cayeron de una vez en la crisis de la quiebra y se vieron gravemente amenazadas la salud y la vida de los habitantes.
					
					 Lo que hizo en el ano pasado el traidor Lee, que tomo el "poder" bajo el disfraz del "presidente de la economia", fue llevar la economia surcoreana a la crisis catastrofica poniendo la vida del pueblo en la extremada miseria.
					
					La banda del traidor Lee tergiverso la Insurreccion Popular del 3 de Abril en la Isla de Jeju contra la ocupacion del Sur de Corea por EE.UU. y su dominacion colonial como un acto ocurrido por la "agitacion de las fuerzas izquierdistas", resto la importancia del Levantamiento Popular del 19 de Abril calificandolo de simple "manifestacion" y desautorizo hacer referencias a la Insurreccion Popular de Junio y la Sublevacion de Kwangju.
					
					En cuanto al colonialismo japones sobre Corea, lo elogio como si esto hubiera traido la "civilizacion" y la "modernizacion" de Corea.
					
					Por otra parte, alabo la administracion militar que practico EE.UU. en el Sur de Corea en el periodo posterior al 15 de agosto de 1945 (dia de liberacion de Corea) hablando de la supuesta "defensa de la democracia liberal", el "aseguramiento de la autonomia democratica", etc.
					
					Calumnio irracionalmente a los antecesores "poderes" hablando tanto de los "10 anos perdidos", lo cual deviene otra tergiversacion de la historia.
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak persiguio perversamente la confrontacion fratricida declarando como "politica sobre el Norte" la teoria anti-reunificacion "la desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3000 dolares".
					
					 Nego totalmente la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y eludio la ejecucion de las mismas.
					
					 Debido a las maniobras de esa banda, todos los acuerdos intercoreanos fueron convertidos hoy en letras muertas y desaparecieron completamente hasta los aparatos institucionales que frenaban los conflictos militares.
					
					 Al asegurar que no habra ninguna colaboracion con el Norte antes de que este "renuncie" a las armas nucleares y acceda a la "apertura", interrumpio de manera unilateral el turismo al monte Kumgang que se realizaba durante 10 anos y agravo malintencionadamente la situacion, de manera que cayeran en la crisis todos los proyectos de cooperacion a nivel civil incluyendo las labores de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y el turismo a esta ciudad.
					
					Lo mas peligroso en sus crimenes anti-reunificacion y antinacionales es que al acusar arbitrariamente el digno sistema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, suelta sin vacilacion los disparates belicosos como la supuesta "situacion bruscamente cambiada" y el "ataque preventivo".
					
					 Todos los hechos arriba mencionados demuestran con toda claridad que al dejar intactos al traidor Lee Myung Bak y su banda, no se puede detener la ruptura total de las relaciones Norte-Sur ni evitar los desastres.
					
					La cronica de tales imperdonables crimenes antinacionales de la banda de Lee sera juzgada severamente por la historia y la nacion.

articles.title: Inaugurada la IV Conferencia Nacional de Agitadores
articles.content:
Inaugurada la IV Conferencia Nacional de Agitadores
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 26 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la IV Conferencia Nacional de Agitadores.
					El conclave hara balance de los exitos y experiencias logrados en la labor politica masiva para la construccion de la patria prospera en el nuevo siglo bajo la direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y discutira las tareas que se presentan ante todos los agitadores y los propagandistas para cinco familias.
					
					 A la cita asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jung Rin, Kim Ki Nam, funcionarios del sector de la labor ideologica del partido, las entidades de masas y de dominios de educacion, cultura y arte, prensa e informacion, ejemplares agitadores y propagandistas para cinco familias de varios sectores de la economia nacional.
					
					 Ante todo, los participantes escucharon la voz grabada-discurso del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Los agitadores deberan ser ejemplo en todos los trabajos y saber poner en accion a las masas", pronunciado el 9 de marzo del 60 (1971) de la Era Juche en la Conferencia Nacional de Dinamicos Agitadores y Propagandistas para Cinco Familias.
					
					 Kim Yong  Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC enviado a los participantes.
					
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung dio temprano inicio a la original labor politica masiva en la selva del monte Paektu y creo el metodo del trabajo de agitacion al estilo de la guerrilla antijaponesa. Tambien, en toda la trayectoria de dirigir la construccion de la nueva patria, la dura Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, la severa revolucion socialista y la magna construccion socialista concedio el gran significado a la labor de agitacion y dirigio sabiamente la labor para elevar incesantemente su poderio, senala el mensaje y prosigue:
					
					 En los dias en que dirigia a la cabeza la causa de  transformacion de toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento la original teoria y orientaciones para la labor de agitacion y establecio el ordinario sistema para este fin en  todo el partido. Tambien, movilizo todas las fuerzas y medios de agitacion para hacer sonar altamente el sonido de tambor de la revolucion y reinar el impetu de la creacion e innovacion en todos los lugares de la construccion socialista.
					
					 Todos los agitadores y propagandistas para cinco familias deben ser jinetes ideologicos de la magna causa de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera que estimulan energicamente a los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores para que estos registren gran innovacion y gran salto sin precedentes en la historia de nuestra patria siguiendo la antorcha del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario encendida por el Dirigente           Kim Jong Il en Kangson, tierra natal de Chollima (caballo alado que corre al dia 400 kilometros).
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC.
					
					El informante dijo que todo el pueblo coreano confia firmemente y sigue solo al Dirigente        Kim Jong Il y dedica sin vacilacion hasta su vida en el camino para defender la Direccion de la Revolucion y subrayo que esta sublime realidad deviene la demostracion fehaciente del poderio de la labor de agitacion que el PTC ha venido impulsando energicamente para hacer que se lleve adelante invariablemente tambien en el nuevo siglo la preciosa tradicion de defensa a ultranza al lider personificada y consolidada en el largo camino de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					 Senalo que ellos deben hacer poner de pleno manifiesto el patriotismo de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo sonando energicamente el clarin de agitacion en el camino de la gran marcha de todos los habitantes para adornar con el gran triunfo del socialismo al estilo coreano los 100 anos de la Corea de Kim Il Sung que brilla con la Era Juche 
					
					Los participantes escucharon las intervenciones.
					
					 La conferencia continua.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena interrupcion de intercambio de noticias Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena interrupcion de intercambio de noticias Norte-Sur
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, la banda de Lee Myung Bak "desautorizo" el intercambio de articulos con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que propuso la direccion de prensa del Comite Sureno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, lo cual muestra que son mentiras puras el "dialogo" y la "cooperacion" de que habla tanto esta horda de traidores.
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en comentario individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					En octubre del ano pasado, el subcomite de prensa del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la sede de prensa de la entidad homologa del Sur acordaron intercambiar las noticias para contribuir a la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion. Por lo tanto, este acuerdo fue aplaudido por toda la nacion coreana.
					
					A pesar de esto, la horda de Lee interrumpio totalmente el intercambio de noticias Norte-Sur desafiando frontalmente a la aspiracion y al anhelo de los connacionales sobre la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos dicen que este intercambio "puede utilizarse como un medio de propaganda del Norte" y "perjudicar la seguridad". Este pretexto es un sofisma para justificar sus actos criminales.
					
					Los hombres de prensa del Norte y el Sur tratan de conocer bien la situacion de su contraparte y crear el ambiente a favor de reconciliacion y unidad nacionales a traves de esa actividad. 
					
					Pero, los titeres surcoreanos la cuestionan absurdamente con dicho pretexto por el temor a que los habitantes surcoreanos sepan la imparcial y justa orientacion de la RPDC sobre la reunificacion de la patria, los constantes esfuerzos de esta por materializarla y la enorme vitalidad de la politica de Songun.
					
					La intencion de la banda de Lee es sofocar el entusiasmo por la  reunificacion mediante la alianza  con el Norte de los habitantes surcoreanos y seguir  el camino de enfrentamiento con el Norte sin tomar en consideracion las relaciones N-S ni los reproches de otros.
					
					Mientras estos traidores siguen en el poder, la nacion coreana no podra mejorar jamas las relaciones N-S ni hacer el dialogo y la cooperacion ni evitar el peligro de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Para evitar estas consecuencias, toda la nacion coreana debe intensificar la lucha contra Lee Myung Bak.
